feed.title: Discovery Lab
feed.subtitle: Driving Scientific Discovery using Machine Intelligence

entry.title: ICAI Interview with Rinke Hoekstra: ‘Academics help seeing the big picture.’

link.title: ICAI Interview with Rinke Hoekstra: ‘Academics help seeing the big picture.’

entry.content:
Rinke Hoekstra, Lead Architect at Elsevier, is Industry Director of Discovery Lab. Rinke was interviewed by ICAI to talk about the collaboration with the University of Amsterdam and Vrije Universiteit Amsterdam: ‘Within Elsevier this is already seen as one of the most successful collaborations with academic partners.’
Read the interview at [the ICAI website](https://icai.ai/icai-interview-with-rinke-hoekstra-academics-help-seeing-the-big-picture/).
<!--more-->
entry.summary: Rinke Hoekstra, Lead Architect at Elsevier, is Industry Director of Discovery Lab. Rinke was interviewed by ICAI to talk about the collaboration with the University of Amsterdam and Vrije Universiteit Amsterdam: ‘Within Elsevier this is already seen as one of the most successful collaborations with academic partners.’ Read the interview at the ICAI website.

entry.title: How AI and knowledge graphs can make your research easier

link.title: How AI and knowledge graphs can make your research easier

entry.content:
Data scientists are developing a knowledge graph with researchers in mind in Elsevier's DiscoveryLab, collaborating with Vrije Universiteit and University of Amsterdam.
Read the article on [Elsevier Connect](https://www.elsevier.com/connect/how-ai-and-knowledge-graphs-can-make-your-research-easier). <!--more-->
entry.summary: Data scientists are developing a knowledge graph with researchers in mind in Elsevier’s DiscoveryLab, collaborating with Vrije Universiteit and University of Amsterdam. Read the article on Elsevier Connect.
